activities.loc: Courtroom B, Third Floor - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Lee Thompson

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Adjourned initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

09:00 AM Attorney Emmeline Lee appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Christopher Lee Thompson appeared by phone with Attorney Shanna Sanders by video. Complaint received, formal reading waived, not guilty plea entered on all counts. Bond continued. Remand to Branch 6.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report
Adjourned initial appearance on August 30, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Initial Appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

03:45 PM  Prosecuting attorney Richard Jay Sullivan appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Christopher Thompson appeared by video in custody at the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Taylor E Klokow appeared by video for Christopher Lee Thompson. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified.  $250.00 cash bond set with conditions.  Defendant requests preliminary hearing, within time limits by zoom.  Preliminary Hearing set for August 30. 2022 at 9pm.

No contact directly or indirectly with victim A.J.H., his/her residence, place of employment, vehicle, or elsewhere. No contact with Orfordville Laundry, Parkview School District or Taqueria Guzman Restaurant. No acts or threats of violence towards anyone. Court orders Level 3 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.
